attributes.action: Cervical Cancer Awareness in memory of Natalie Poole
attributes.additional_details: Due to the huge increase in young women now dying of cervical cancer due to the smear age being 25 i call for this to be lowered to a average age of 17. Cervical cancer can be treatable if cought in the early stages without early smear testing it is now becoming harder to beat more funding should be made available to make this possible.
